# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $150. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to propose a different price. I look forward to hearing from you soon! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
